rules_text:
[i]Augmented[/i] – When TD-3 Slyten Retriever enters, if it's not a token and you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, create a token that's a copy of it.
When TD-3 Slyten Retriever dies, draw a card and gain 3 life.
flavor_text: [i]The sun has gone down, and the moon has come up, yet it still drives.[/i]
